item.title: Must-Know Data Structures and Algorithms for FAANG Interviews
item.description:
Must-Know Data Structures and Algorithms for FAANG Interviews

Overview

Cracking FAANG interviews requires more than basic programming skillsâ€”it demands a deep understanding of data structures and algorithms (DSA). These concepts form the foundation of problem-solving in coding interviews. This guide highlights the must-know topics and practical tips to boost your preparation.

1. Top 10 Algorithms to Master

A strong grasp of fundamental algorithms will give you an edge in technical interviews. Here’s a list of the most commonly asked ones:
